sense.def:
A strategic plan or action
je načrt ali dejanje, s katerim naj bi nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: I took up a strategic position near the exit.

sense.def:
Strategic weapons and policies
so orožja in taktike, ki so del državnega obrambnega sistema.

seg.quote: His country had made the same strategic error.
The islands were strategically important to Venice.
